project.Title: Homunculus / Class mod 1.7
project.ItemDescription:
New update is on way to be finished, thanks for your patience
[h1][b]Content [/b][/h1] [h1]----------------------------------------------------[/h1]
[b]Lore[/b] A young man who's name was Alphonse, got his life ruined cause of Ancestor's madness. He lost everything of his past life, which now belong to the past now he's bound to a dead body, which despite of being robust is protean and can change as he wish, and he will need to learn how to use it, to survive in a world which no longer want him...
[b]Gameplay[/b] To explain well, Code wise, the Homunculus is a transform fighter, he go from the Protean mode to the Exuviated mode. His 7 ability are the same in the two mode but Protean mode, give a Shell buff which is a battle duration buff and then it switch to Exuviated mode where he will be able to get advantage of the fight considering his Shell. (As a quick example, if i use Scourge on turn one, on turn two, All skills will be able to blight
[h1][b] Skills [/b][/h1] [h1]----------------------------------------------------[/h1]
[b]Eldritch Comfort[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/6haMHJL.png[/img] OOOO
[i]Protean mode[/i] Heal the whole team like Gods Comfort Give the Healer shell: +heal +Crit and Spd as party buff
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] Heal the whole team like Gods Comfort Give a stres heal received buff
[b]Flesh Veil[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/0D0FnED.png[/img] XOOO
[i]Protean mode[/i] Stealth one ally Give the Shield shell: +Dmg Reflect +Guard
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] Stealth one ally give Hom dmg reflection
[b]Dangerous Game![/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/6VFCSG3.png[/img] XOOO OOXX
[i]Protean mode[/i] Do a big punch that will push ennemies Give The Hunter shell: +crit +stun chance
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] The punch can Apply Blight (if Caustic Shell) and Steal Crit (if Thief Shell)
[b]Mind Shot[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/ASAyjBh.png[/img] OOXX XOOO
[i]Protean mode[/i] A strong arrow shot that can dmg backline Give Dmg shell: +Flat Dmg +Acc
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] the arrow shot can now blight (if Caustic Shell) Steal Dmg (if Thief Shell) and Stun (if Hunt Shell)
[b]Keening[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Mc8oj0z.png[/img] XOXO
[i]Protean mode[/i] A keening howl which heal stress Give Soothing shell: +stress healed +Spd
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] The keening howl can now also buff target crit and heal received for the next turn but it increase stress received
[b]Wither[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/OkhdwSW.png[/img] OOOO XOOO
[i]Protean mode[/i] A curse which Mark the ennemy and Steal his dodge Give Thief shell: +Steal stats chance + dodge
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] Can now blight (if Caustic Shell) and Stun (if Hunt Shell)
[b]Scourge[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/ASAyjBh.png[/img] OOXX XXO+O
[i]Protean mode[/i] Drop a plague grenade which can blight the two last rank Give Caustic shell: +Blight chance +Blight Amount
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] Can now Stun (if Hunt Shell) and Steal Spd (if Thief Shell)
[b]Dissolution[/b] (move skill) [img]https://i.imgur.com/IgKtaCN.png[/img]
[i]Protean mode[/i] Shuffle self clear guard
[i]Exuviated mode[/i] Switch to protean mode Clear Debuffs/Blight/Bleed
[h1][b]Camp Skill [/b][/h1] [h1]----------------------------------------------------[/h1]
[b]Eldritch Flesh[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/eiCv3kD.png[/img] Self: +40% Blight resistance
[b]Open your Mind ![/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LkkPJ8m.png[/img] Self: -40% stress received, -60% stress received when afflicted [b]A fair trade ?[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/KdpURbU.png[/img] Target: +25 dodge and -25% hp Self: +25% hp
[b]A strange gift[/b] [img]https://i.imgur.com/StgPOuv.png[/img] Give an Anomalous Appendage which blight and give Flesh curse when consumed
[h1][b]Flesh Curse[/b][/h1] [img]https://i.imgur.com/WJmZWGW.png[/img] Death Blowset to 0% Cannot be Bled -50% Food consumed 0 Heal from food (Not on camping for now) +20% Stress "You feel empty inside..."
[h1][b]Other Information[/b][/h1] [h1]------------------------------------------[/h1] [list] [*]His default name is Alphonse. [*]He will only use the meditation for stress relief. [*]He uses the Outsider bonfire district. [*]Additionally, the mod includes 1 new Collector head trinket. (which is blank for now) [*]The mod includes Flesh Curse disease which interract with 8 new trinkets. [*]The Homunculus has a town event so you can get one immediately. [*]This mod is fully compatible with all 3 DLCs. [*]This mod currently supports English, Simplified Chinese, Russian and Portuguese localization, with French coming soon. If you can help translate this mod into Korean, Polish, Spanish, Italian, Czech, German or Japanese, please contact me, SoulSmile on Steam or on Discord: Homunculus#0677. [/list]
